restructuring_plan.description: Semantic naming for database-agnostic queries. Names describe WHAT data, not WHERE used.
principles: Add variant suffix only if semantically different (GetTableColumns_WithPrimaryKeys)
Prefer richest query, transform in code for presentation
SERVICE prefix OK for service-layer abstractions
No GUI/CLI distinction - same query serves both

merges.action: Keep CLI version (more complete: has OrdinalPosition, IsNullable as bool)
merges.gui_transformation: In code: map IsNullable (0/1) to 'Yes'/'No', DefaultValue (empty) to '-'

merges.action: Keep CLI version (simpler: one row per constraint, column lists as strings)
merges.gui_transformation: GUI uses complex join for detailed view - keep GUI query as GetTableForeignKeys_Detailed

merges.action: Keep CLI version (has full metadata), GUI uses LISTAGG
merges.gui_transformation: GUI needs column aggregation - keep GUI query as GetTableIndexes_Aggregated

notes.service_prefix: SERVICE_* queries can stay or be renamed. They represent specific service-layer abstractions which is valid.
notes.transformation_layer: GUI code can transform boolean 0/1 to Yes/No, add user-friendly labels, etc.
